title: Galaxia Galaxy Watch Face
summary: Galaxia is a beautiful .space watch face. featuring beautiful hand picked images

descriptionHTML:
The app is very new and will be updated and improved regularly, please rate 5 stars to show support of this project and help us continue making nothing short of the best app we can!


----------------

Galaxia watchface brings the beauty of the universe to your wrist.

31 unique hand picked space images including famous galaxies, nebula and the 9 planets are available. The first true. Space Watch Face.

Beautiful and stunning pictures right to your android wear device, unlike many galaxy watch faces our images are hand picked so you only get the best of the best. We also offer our users to email us suggestions! send your wallpaper suggestions to emeraldstudiosltd@gmail.com and your wallpaper may feature in the next release!.

Galaxia is also customisable, you can choose your favourite wallpaper out of a huge list of 31 different images, with more to come soon, you may also select auto, auto mode will display different pictures every so often at random.

Like all of our watch faces we included the capability of viewing your battery at a glance, a must have feature that is not present in many watch faces. We also included Emerald Wear Power Saver™ Technology as with all our watch faces. This enables you to maximize your battery life. Our software uses the tiniest possible amount of power by using the CPU as little and as efficiently as possible, this is done in various ways behind the scenes. You can expect significantly longer lasting battery when using our .Battery Saving Watch face.

With new images added weekly, this is the most comprehensive .Galaxy Watch face. on the store, download our. Space Watch Face. Today!
comments: It's ok. Really nothing amazing here. The watchface looks good but in the description it is implied there is a bunch of customization but really all you can do is change the background. There is no date option. I also find it hard to believe that this watchface is "optimized" to magically give you better battery life. Also seems there hasn't been an update in over a month which makes me a little nervous these basic features will not come.
Tricky to setup , for some reason it wasn't working, now it is
